name: NodeRole
description: The NodeRole class describes the intended function performed by a particular host.

ext-category.name: ext-category
ext-category.description: A means by which to extend the category attribute.  See Section 5.1.

lang.name: lang
lang.description: A valid language code per RFC 4646 [7] constrained by the definition of "xs:language".  The interpretation of this code is described in Section 6.
